ApproxsimClient.map
Class DisplayControl

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.DisplayControl

public class DisplayControl
extends Object

This class implements variety of panels used to control display of approxsim elements and other objects on the map.

Constructor Summary
DisplayControl(Client client, MapDrawer drawer)
          Creates the DisplayControl.
 
Method Summary
 JPanel getElementsDisplayPanel()
          Returns the panel which controls display of the elements on the map.
 JPanel getGeneralDisplayPanel()
          Returns the panel which controls display of the general features on the map.
 char getHighestRankUnit()
          Returns the symbol of the military unit with highest rank in the map.
 JPanel getPreferenceDisplayPanel()
          Returns the panel which controls preferences of the elements on the map.
 JPanel getSimulationPanel()
          Returns the panel which controls display of the military units, activities, agencies and process variables.
 JPanel getTopographyPanel()
          Returns the panel which controls display of the cities, borders and graticules.
 void setAgencyFilter(ApproxsimObjectFilter filter)
          Updates the filter for elements of type Agency.
 void setMilitaryUnitFilter(ApproxsimObjectFilter filter)
          Updates the filter for elements of type MilitaryUnit.

          Updates the filter for elements of type Population.

          Updates the filter for elements of type Activity.

          Updates the filter for elements of type MilitaryUnit.

Method Detail

updateActivityFilter

public void updateActivityFilter(Client client,
                                 boolean past,
                                 boolean present,
                                 boolean future)
Updates the filter for elements of type Activity.

Parameters:
client - reference to the client.
past - if true the past activities will pass the filter.
present - if true the present activities will pass the filter.
future - if true the future activities will pass the filter.

updateMilitaryUnitFilter

public void updateMilitaryUnitFilter(JCheckBoxMenuItem[] force_items,
                                     JCheckBoxMenuItem[] mobile_items)
Updates the filter for elements of type MilitaryUnit.

Parameters:
force_items - list of JCheckBox items where the items represent military force units.
mobile_items - list of JCheckBox items where the items represent military mobile units.

setMilitaryUnitFilter

public void setMilitaryUnitFilter(ApproxsimObjectFilter filter)
Updates the filter for elements of type MilitaryUnit.

Parameters:
filter - the miltary units filter update.

setAgencyFilter

public void setAgencyFilter(ApproxsimObjectFilter filter)
Updates the filter for elements of type Agency.

Parameters:
filter - the agency filter update.

setPopulationFilter

public void setPopulationFilter(ApproxsimObjectFilter filter)
Updates the filter for elements of type Population.

Parameters:
filter - the population filter update.
